title: How to Make a Healthy Shortcake

steps.headline: Lightly coat baking sheet with cooking spray.
In a large mixing bowl, add flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.
Using a fork, or a pastry knife, cut in the margarine with the dry ingredients until it forms a crumby mixture.
Add the milk and stir until a moist dough forms.
Turn the dough onto a generously floured surface.
Flour hands and knead the dough about 6-8 times until it becomes manageable and smooth.
Using a rolling pin, roll the dough into a rectangle about ⁄4 inch (0.6 cm) thick.
Place squares on the prepared baking pan, bake until golden about 10-12 minutes.
Transfer biscuits onto plates and top each on with 1 cup of strawberries and 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of yogurt.

text: Preheat oven to 450F.  Lightly coat baking sheet with cooking spray.  In a large mixing bowl, add flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.  Using a fork, or a pastry knife, cut in the margarine with the dry ingredients until it forms a crumby mixture.  Add the milk and stir until a moist dough forms.  Turn the dough onto a generously floured surface.  Flour hands and knead the dough about 6-8 times until it becomes manageable and smooth.  Using a rolling pin, roll the dough into a rectangle about ⁄4 inch (0.6 cm) thick.  Cut into 6 squares.  Place squares on the prepared baking pan, bake until golden about 10-12 minutes.  Transfer biscuits onto plates and top each on with 1 cup of strawberries and 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of yogurt.
